name: Power Towers
description:
You control an army of automated contraptions that are powered remotely by Power Towers. Your contraptions can only operate within range of the towers. Gather materials to build more towers to expand your territory.

Only your opponents use the same power towers, so where you can go they can go.

Unfortunately I didn't have time to make a tutorial, and this game is buggy and hard to understand as it is, but I will do my best to explain it here:

The goal of the game is to destroy your opponents power generator, and keep them from destroying yours.

Their are 3 unit types

  • Exploiters: they can harvest materials from mountains or other units.
  • Builders: they turn materials into more units or power towers.
  • Solders: go fast and shoot things.

You select units by left-clicking on them and then you will see a yellow aura around the selected unit. Right-click on a valid target within the aura to use that units ability as explained above.

You can move/rotate the camera by dragging the mouse across the screen while holding left/right buttons  respectively. Scroll to zoom.

Never Join a game jam at the last moment kids!
